scripts.compile-linked: cd ~/geotiff.js && npm run build && cd ~/georaster && npm run babel && cd ~/georaster-layer-for-leaflet && npm run babel && cd ~/geotiff-io && npm run babel && npm run build && cd ~/geotiff.io && npm run less
scripts.debug-chain: npm run compile-linked && npm run start
scripts.build: react-scripts build && mv docs/CNAME . && rm -fr docs && cp -fr build docs && mv CNAME docs/.
scripts.debug-docs: npm run link-repos && npm run compile-linked && npm run build && cd docs && http-server
